EmailTemplate.name: Customer - Case Created
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Case # {!Case.CaseNumber}: "{!Case.Subject}" has been created.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Account.Name},
Thank you for contacting {!Organization.Name} customer service. We are sending you this email to confirm ticket # {!Case.CaseNumber}: "{!Case.Subject}" has been created. A Customer Service Representative will follow up with you shortly.
Thank you and best regards, {!Organization.Name} Customer Service
